This excellent video features scenes of the incredibly stacked and beautiful Pandora Peaks (mostly) nude in public.  I don't remember details, so I don't remember if she gets COMPLETELY nude or not, but seeing her wearing only bikini bottoms in public is arousing enough!  The scenes ARE setup.  She will pull up to a location in a limo and then get out in whatever skimpy outfit she's wearing, and take her place.  It could be a gas station, it could be a bus stop, but every scene features her showing off her incredible body in public. I spend the whole time fantasizing about what it would be like to some across her in that situation - what would I do and how would she react?  Aaahhhh....

If you're looking for a lot of nudity, you'll only find the illustrious Pandora Peaks here.  The film is of her being nude in public.  She is nude at a gas station, nude at a newspaper stand, nude at a bus stop and nude on the street.  Granted, that's enough; but as impressive as her body is, there's not much else to this film.  If you're a PP fan, you'll love this.

I've always loved Pandora Peaks. She probably was the last bastion of the titan-busted silicone dolls of the 1990s, and even though essentially nothing on her was natural, she had, overall, probably the best body of that group behind the phenomenal Tiffany Towers.

This little DVD, while shot poorly and lit even worse in the late '90s before HD cameras, is interesting and worth a purchase if you can get it  on the cheap. It's interesting first and foremost because Pandora is hot and is fully nude in it (although only occasionally; topless more often than full nude), but secondly because of what's happening behind the scenes. The video is supposedly a backing companion to a planned coffee-table book (anybody know if that ever came into being?) of still images shot of Pandora nude and nearly nude in unusual places. The DVD shows us what it took to get those things to happen, because most of them were done gonzo-style in public areas. So we see video of the crew's trying to avoid being noticed by police while Pandora is fully nude at a newsstand, as an example.

There also are some nice interviews with Pandora, who seems like a very intelligent, kind woman.

The production does try to get a little too full of itself at points (parts of it have this goofy, scripted narration by Pandora herself that is far too high-minded for what is no better than cheesecake), but again, if you can get this for a next-to-nothing price it'll be worth it.

If you're a fan of Russ Meyer and are looking for something that has his vibe but with a unique twist. Then Visions & Voyeurism is for you!

Very well done and all the set ups are not just cool but pretty risky considering a woman like Pandora Peaks is running around naked in the streets of L.A.!

It's not really a erotic film but an art peice that you can put on and just let it play as a tripped out eye candy.

I think this was done before the "girls gone wild" thing hit and it's really ahead of its time in my respects.

I don't much about the director but he's very cool in my book!

Not only does Pandora have a nice set of monster melons, but she also has a real nice BIIIG butt!!! Sometimes you see these giant breasted types have breasts but no body or no face leaving you with just an ugly bag with big breasts. But in this video, you will witness the HOT and SIZZLING Pandora Peaks. You will experience outrageous stunts mostly topless, in bikinis, or totally naked. My only complaint is i personally can do without the annoying dialogue, the euro-trash/disco music, and the semi-boring photo shoots. It would be fun and successful i think to see Pandora in a video that concentrates only on her being TOTALLY naked in public. Overall, great video, very well done.
